description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**Freshman English (Advanced Level)**

Fall Semester 2021

**Course Objectives**

This course aims to build and strengthen students’ overall English proficiency inthe four areas of listening, speaking, reading and writing. Through extensivecourse works, students shall be able: (1). to develop their integrated languageskills, (2). to hone up their verbal and written communication skills, and (3).to enhance their critical reasoning and analytical abilities.

Special emphasis of this course is placed on the development of students’ readingcompetency and verbal information exchanges through quality discussions.Selected course contents include an array of diverse topics and various genresthat will allow students to build their reading comprehensions and skills, gaingeneral knowledge, and expand their vocabulary base. Students are encouraged totake active participations in both in-class and after-class language practicesand activities.

**Course Requirements**

1\. Attendance, Class Participation & Presentation (20%)

2\. In-class exercises and works (20%)

3\. After-Class Practice (5%)

4\. Lexile Placement Test &  Assinged Readings (20%)

5\. Midterm Exam (15%)

6\. Final Exam (20%) 

**Required Text**

Brenda Wegmann and Miki Knezevic (2014)Mosaic 2_: Reading._ New York:McGraw-Hill Education.
